text: Goniothalamus chinensis is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is found in China and Vietnam. A leaf of Goniothalamus chinensis ==References== * Ban, N.T. 1998. Goniothalamus chinensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Goniothalamus chinensis
